item.description: This park is in the exquisite NE Kingdom and the exploring never disappoints. Going by the map (http://www.vtstateparks.com/pdfs/groton_trails.pdf), there is a whole array of trails to pick. Whichever route is decided upon, the endpoint has to be the Owl's Head overlook, which provides a superb ~180Â° vista. Currently leaving the date open to see what works best for the most people. The top two weekends are the 15/16th and the 29/30th. Since it is about a 2 hour drive from exit 9, going on a Saturday may be preferred.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Groton State Forest
